tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_meter (
    meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT NOT NULL,
    meter_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_reading_date DATE NOT NULL,
    current_reading DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_facility FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES facility_data(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_cost (
    cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id INT NOT NULL,
    cost_per_kwh DECIMAL(8,4) NOT NULL,
    billing_period_start DATE NOT NULL,
    billing_period_end DATE NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_meter FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES energy_meter(meter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE facility (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE energy_meter (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT NOT NULL,
    meter_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    unit VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    installation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES facility (id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_reading (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id INT NOT NULL,
    reading_date DATE NOT NULL,
    reading DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES energy_meter (id)
);

CREATE TABLE facility_manager (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT NOT NULL,
    manager_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    manager_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES facility (id)
);

CREATE TABLE facility_address (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT NOT NULL,
    address_line VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    zip_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES facility (id)
);
